date_created.description: Date and time when the product was created.

date_created_gmt.description: GMT date and time when the product was created.

date_modified.description: Date and time when the product was last modified.

date_modified_gmt.description: GMT date and time when the product was last modified.

type.description: Type of the product (simple, variable, etc.).

status.description: Status of the product (publish, draft, etc.).

catalog_visibility.description: Visibility of the product in the catalog.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) for the product.

date_on_sale_from.description: Date and time when the sale starts for the product.

date_on_sale_from_gmt.description: GMT date and time when the sale starts for the product.

date_on_sale_to.description: Date and time when the sale ends for the product.

date_on_sale_to_gmt.description: GMT date and time when the sale ends for the product.

price_html.description: HTML representation of the product price.

on_sale.description: Flag indicating if the product is on sale.

purchasable.description: Flag indicating if the product can be purchased.

total_sales.description: Total sales count for the product.

virtual.description: Flag indicating if the product is virtual (downloadable without physical delivery).

downloadable.description: Flag indicating if the product is downloadable.

downloads.description: List of downloads associated with the product.

download_limit.description: Limit on the number of times the product can be downloaded.

download_expiry.description: Number of days before the download link expires.

external_url.description: URL to an external resource related to the product.

button_text.description: Text displayed on the button for this product.

manage_stock.description: Flag indicating if stock management is enabled.

stock_quantity.description: Available quantity of the product in stock.

stock_status.description: Status indicating if the product is in stock or out of stock.

backorders.description: Number of backorders for the product.

backorders_allowed.description: Flag indicating if backorders are allowed for the product.

backordered.description: Flag indicating if the product is backordered.

sold_individually.description: Flag indicating if the product is sold individually.

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the product like height, width, and length.

shipping_required.description: Flag indicating if shipping is required for the product.

shipping_taxable.description: Flag indicating if the product is taxable for shipping.

shipping_class_id.description: ID of the shipping class associated with the product.

reviews_allowed.description: Flag indicating if reviews are allowed for the product.

average_rating.description: Average rating given by customers for the product.

rating_count.description: Total number of ratings received for the product.

upsell_ids.description: IDs of products recommended for upselling.

cross_sell_ids.description: IDs of products recommended for cross-selling.

parent_id.description: ID of the parent product, if applicable.

purchase_note.description: Additional notes for the purchase of the product.

categories.description: Categories to which the product belongs.

attributes.description: List of product attributes such as color, size, material, etc.

default_attributes.description: Default attributes set for the product.

menu_order.description: Order in which the product appears in menus.

meta_data.description: Additional meta data associated with the product.

jetpack-related-posts.description: Related posts generated by Jetpack plugin

id.description: Unique identifier for the related post.

url_meta.description: Meta information related to the URL.

rel.description: Relationship information for the related post.

block_context.description: Context information for the related post block.

img.description: Image details of the related post.

classes.description: Classes assigned to the related post block.
